pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Breathe Easier Essential Oil 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Breathe Easier with Eucalyptus, Mint & Myrtle essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy for the relief of of cold & flu symptoms.

Warnings

STORE BELOW 30C

NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY.

KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN

Common Uses

The powerful decongestant effects of Eucalyptus and Mint essential oils have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to help relieve symptoms of cold and flu including, mucous congestion, sinusitis, mild upper respiratory infections and bronchial coughs, while the gentle action of Myrtle essential oil has been used to help promote restful sleep.

Ingredients

Each mL of PURE ESSENTIAL OIL

contains essential oils from: Eucalyptus globulus

(Eucalyptus) Leaves & Terminal Branches 550 µL,

Mentha arvensis (Corn Mint) Leaves 400 µL,

Myrtus communis (Myrtle) 50 µL. In a 100%

natural base of Grape Seed Oil, Sweet Almond

Oil and Vitamin E.

Directions

How to Use (Adults and children 2 years and over, use as required or up to 6 times a day): Apply to chest and back as required.
